scripts.setup: cd magic && yarn link && cd ../engine && yarn link magic && cd ../logic && yarn link magic
scripts.start: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "engine,logic,magic" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold,purple.bold" "cd engine && yarn start" "cd logic && yarn start" "cd magic && yarn start"
scripts.migrate: cd engine && yarn migrate && cd ../logic && yarn migrate
scripts.rollback: cd logic && yarn rollback && cd ../engine && yarn rollback
